response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its full value, providing you with an excellent return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
